reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it falls below the knee, and appreciate its quality, with one describing it as elegantly made. The dress is soft, comfortable, and dressed up for nice occasions, while being flattering and hugging in the right places. The fabric thickness and stretchiness receive mixed feedback - while some find the material thick, others note it's not very thick, and while some describe it as very stretchy, others mention issues with the hip area. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like butter!
items.body: I bought this dress bc Iâ€™m 16 weeks pregnant, which means Iâ€™m at that awkward stage where my regular clothes donâ€™t fit and maternity clothes are too loose.. tbh I wasnâ€™t expecting much from this dress, you know, Amazon quality ðŸ‘Ž but holy cow this dress is soooo buttery soft, comfortable, and flattering. I bought my normal size and it definitely has room for the bump to grow, and also knowing that I can use it again when Iâ€™m not pregnant is a plus. The collar cut is not as pictured, itâ€™s a little bit higher and narrow, which makes it look a bit odd, but the positives overcome this one negative. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: Lovely dress, but runs big. Have to return because it was too baggy, but may try a smaller size. Read more
items.author: David

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sweater dress.
items.body: I love it and it fits great. Read more
items.author: Aretha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO comfortable and flattering
items.body: I absolutely love this dress. I bought it for my baby shower and initially got a large, but ended up reordering a medium. truthfully I could have gotten away with a small but I did enjoy the extra room. I wore this for a wedding, my baby shower, and maternity pictures and will 100% be ordering again for post pregnancy stuff. the material is thick but not frumpy; it kept me warm in an outdoor October wedding in the PNW. I am about 5 feet tall and curvy so I wasnt sure about form fitting but it was so flattering. 10/10 love love love Read more
items.author: Aubrey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bit see through
items.body: Beautiful dress! Itâ€™s a bit see through, thatâ€™s the only thing. But it feels nice and looks good on my curves. Read more
items.author: M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater dress
items.body: This is dress is perfect for occasions where you want to be a little bit dressy but not over the top. The quality is very nice....not thin and flimsy at all. The sleeves are very pretty with a slight ballooning at the bottom. The neckline is interesting without being too revealing. I would definitely recommend it. It also fits pretty much true to size. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Lightpink, Peacock, Goldentea, Ivory, Purple, Lightblue, Royalblue, Rose, Lightkhaki, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
